scripts.export: shx rm -rf ./project && n8n export:workflow --backup --output ./project/workflows && n8n export:credentials --backup --output ./project/credentials
scripts.import: dotenv cross-env N8N_ENCRYPTION_KEY=%N8N_ENCRYPTION_KEY% && n8n import:credentials --separate --input ./project/credentials && n8n import:workflow --separate --input ./project/workflows
scripts.ex: npm run export && npm run push
scripts.im: npm run pull && npm run import
scripts.clean: shx rm -rf ./project && shx rm -rf ./temp && shx rm -rf ./node_modules
scripts.n8n: dotenv cross-env N8N_ENCRYPTION_KEY=%N8N_ENCRYPTION_KEY% && cross-env EXECUTIONS_DATA_PRUNE=true && cross-env EXECUTIONS_DATA_MAX_AGE=168 && cross-env N8N_USER_MANAGEMENT_DISABLED=true && n8n start
